meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of long, hollow tubes
meanings.sent1: I cooked the ziti for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The ziti pasta was delicious with the tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they slurped up the ziti noodles.
meanings.sent4: The ziti tubes looked like little tunnels on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ziti filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A dish made with ziti pasta, typically baked with sauce and cheese
meanings.sent1: Mom's baked ziti is always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a serving of ziti at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The gooey cheese on the ziti bubbled in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The ziti casserole was a warm hug on a cold evening.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust on the ziti dish made it irresistible.
